name: matomo
tagline: A self-hosted web analytics platform focused on user privacy
description: Matomo is a self-hosted web analytics platform that respects user privacy while providing detailed insights into web traffic. It supports tracking, heatmaps, A/B testing, and integrates with many CMS and eCommerce tools.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track website visitors while respecting privacy with GDPR-compliant data collection

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Monitor current visitors, page views, and user actions as they happen

features.title: Heatmaps
features.description: Visualize where users click, scroll, and interact on your web pages

features.title: A/b Testing
features.description: Run experiments to compare different versions of pages and measure conversion impact

features.title: Goal Tracking
features.description: Define and measure conversion goals like form submissions or purchases

features.title: E
features.description: Track product views, cart additions, and revenue with detailed transaction data

features.title: Custom Dimensions
features.description: Add custom data points to track specific user attributes or behaviors

features.title: Segment Analysis
features.description: Filter and analyze visitor data by demographics, behavior, or custom criteria
